summary: The diff implements the Promise Day single-page UI with the specified three image URLs, top-then-two-below photo layout, and an emoji shower rendered as a non-interactive overlay above the card. It also introduces additional authentication/actor plumbing and extra page elements that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces Internet Identity authentication context/provider and actor/React Query identity-based actor creation, despite authentication being a stated non-goal and not required for the single public page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists adding user accounts/Internet Identity authentication as a non-goal; the diff adds hooks and wraps the app in an InternetIdentityProvider.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a footer with copyright and an external link/attribution (caffeine.ai).
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer content/attribution is not mentioned in the requirements and is extra visible page content beyond reproducing the provided greeting page elements.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds click-to-trigger emoji burst behavior on the whole page.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 asks for overlay/non-blocking/cleanup behavior, but does not request a click interaction to trigger bursts.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds an (empty) backend Motoko canister actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend changes were to be made only if strictly necessary; an empty actor does not appear necessary for the requested static/shareable greeting page.
